channel.title: Client Download HELP!
channel.description: How can i make a downloadable client,ok i went into the client and changed it to my ip,but now if i upload will it have my settings,and will people be able to get on it?

item.title: Client Download HELP!
item.dc:creator: @King_Zeus King Zeus
item.description:
@King_Zeus wrote:

Idont know what kind of client it is ive only ever used delta 317.

If that is what you are using go to the GUI and make the IP the EXACT ip of your no-ip adress. If you dont have no-ip and everything well there are about 10 bill tutorials on it so.

Once you do that and compille it, It will always connect to that ip unless someone changes it. You probabily want an anti-leech wich i am currently looking into. When i sort that out you will be the first to know

Read full topic

If your server is online and you porforwarded, yes.
